item.title: Postgres High Availability with CDC
item.description: Postgres High Availability can face challenges with Change Data Capture (CDC). The design of Postgres‚Äô replication introduces complexities that may stall failover. The primary system emits Write Ahead Logs (WAL) to standbys.
